name: latest_retrieve_selected_160_symbols
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_metal_prices.
Tool description: Live prices for Gold, Silver, Palladium and Platinum in 160+ currencies including USD, GBP and EUR.
API description: Select what you need for a smaller payload! Real-time Gold, Silver, Palladium, and Platinum provided in 160+ currencies including USD, GBP and EUR.

requestedsymbols.description: A string representing the metal symbols for which the prices are requested.
